phrases: Er, I did not think you would actually come by.
I-It is not a big deal.
Are you sure you should be wandering out by yourself?
No one's going to abduct me right after Christmas.
You were abducted on Christmas, though.
I thought a mage's home would have a more ominous vibe.
But it is spacious and clean.
I guess I should not tell her there is all kinds of creatures on her.
I will be in my study.
Want to come to my room?
When are you going back to London?
I will come hang out again next month,
so you come to my place, too.
Do you want to take some with you?
It is going to be Christmas every time we meet.
it is been a long time since I have made a friend.
I do not know what to do.
It would help if you could tell me.
Invite me to do whatever you want to do,
What if they do not like it, though?
You are obviously not the same person as your friend.
You are obviously not going to have all the same interests.
Words are not for understanding each other.
They exist for the sake of talking to each other.
Or so my Dad says, but honestly, a jerk is a jerk from beginning to end.
Even though you are about my age.
Oh yeah, how old are you again?
I would decided I would say what I mean to say, but it is pretty hard.
Although you do not seem like you would be.
I am hoping to come over to your place soon.
Silky, did he leave a note?
Sorry, Ruth, can you walk Stella home?
Yeah, are you going after him?
Let us hang out again sometime.
Say what she means to say...
She talks more with her arms and legs than with her mouth.
I will take on the form I need to take to do what needs to be done.
I cannot keep up with the legs of a fox.
I would be too big with the body of a bear.
Maybe it is looking for its pack or something.
You are a proper wolf this time.
I am sorry if we were making too much noise.
I will be more careful next time.
Is there something that upset you?
Listening to your voices oddly made me want to leave home.
I wanted Stella to go away.
I thought I wanted to be alone,
but as soon as I knew you were chasing me, I felt better.
And yet, I could not stop running.
Why do not we go home and have tea?
Elias must be more confused about himself than he realizes.
I thought he was leaving me.
Elias might have been the same way.
Can I allow myself the conceit of thinking that is how much he thinks of me?
You are in a good mood, Stella.
When are we going to Grandma's place next time?
I will take another look around.
He is going to eat me.
He is going to consume me.
I do not want that right now.
Are you looking for your master?
You all made an offering of raindrop fruits and branches to Mother.
In return, I will lend you my flame.
Next winter, when I become Mother,
I hope you will offer me raindrop fruits and branches again.
I think he had some kind of temper tantrum.
What did my mom tell me in these situations?
What you are feeling is probably what is called jealousy, Elias.
A feeling of envy, of wondering why you are singled out.
But being jealous of someone of something...
Being envious or resentful will only bring you misery.
That is not something you are meant to throw at people.
It is something you have to deal with inside yourself.
Even though I am the most envious of all.
Keep being selfish, and I will have to take matters into my own hands.
There is no telling where this knife will land!
Let us talk lots when we get home.
Stella taught me a lot today, too.
I would like for you to listen.
Let us stay up for a while in bed to talk,
Come on, let us go home.
They were like father and daughter until just the other day.
Now they are like mother and son.
Sorry, do you think you could wait for a bit?
Are you a mage, too, David-san?
I am lucky enough to both have a job,
and have a good relationship with my family.
Other than that, I am nothing special.
Sorry, she is been a bit difficult lately.
I just met a similar kid recently.
Not since the night of the 26th.
One, two, where do you bloom?
Under the window where the children sleep,
white flowers on the night of a pale moon...
Three, four, where do you bloom?
On the frame of Mother's mirror,
You sang him a lullaby, and he fell asleep?!
I did some research, too, but I am scared.
You say that, but you tried a few things.
If your magic compounded with your song, that is magic itself.
It does not normally happen unless you intend it,
but that might be your talent, Chise.
Then why am I bad at making sleeping aids?
I would like to get you something next Christmas.
You should get some sleep there if you are not feeling well.
I heard you often push yourself too far.
You cannot really go to the hospital for it, right?
There is someone who talks about you like you are her own child.
Angie has not changed ever since I met her.
I would been asking her out ever since I was a snotty brat.
After more years than I can count on two hands,
It was only after our daughter was born
that I finally got a sense of why she would always turned me down.
I do not have to think about dying by myself.
They have to continue sending people off, and there is no end in sight.
It is painful to think about how many days are left that we can laugh together.
But unlike me, if things pan out for you, you can keep up.
So let us live as long as we can without stressing or forcing it.
Was it the medicine or was it that?
We are going to get in trouble for coming out this far.
But kids are not supposed to go this far.
Surrender and return to the soil.
Nice to meet you, mister caretaker.
The wandering sorcerer, Joseph, is on the move.
Joseph's scheming leads the girl and the mage to frantic London.
Depending on price and terms, I will take on your work.
